tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Cleaning,Dental Checkup (General),Dental Crowns,
review:
I recently had the pleasure of visiting Dental Canvas, and I can confidently say it was a remarkable experience. Dr. Karishma and her team saved my teeth with the utmost professionalism and care. From the moment I walked in, the ambiance of the office was inviting and calming, setting the tone for a positive experience.

The procedure I underwent was handled with precision and expertise, leaving me thoroughly impressed. Not only was the service top-notch, but it was also excellent value fr money.

What truly sets Dental Canvas apart is the personal connection I made with Dr. Karishma. She didn't just perform the procedure; she guided me through every step of the journey, making me feel like a friend rather than just a patient. Her genuine care and warmth made the entire experience more comfortable and reassuring.

And to top it all off, I was pleasantly surprised when Dr. Karishma and her team remembered my birthday during a routine checkup. The small gesture made me feel truly valued as a patient and speaks volumes about the level of personalized care provided at Dental Canvas.

I highly recommend Dental Canvas to anyone in search of exceptional dental care in a welcoming environment. Thank you, Dr. Karishma, and the team at Dental Canvas, for exceeding my expectations and giving me a reason to smile confidently again!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Got my cavities filled today by Dr. karishma at Dental canvas. The clinic is well maintained, following good procedures and all the equipment is well sterilized and very clean.  She guided me really well before, during and after the procedure ensuring i have a seemless and painless experience. Dental canvas is definitely recommended for all your dental needs and specially for the introverts cause she will ensure you keep your mouth open. Haha

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Good and friendly explain the issue in deatails and answered all my questions. Definitely recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Karishma is a dentist who knows what she's doing. I had pain in one my teeth, she took xray to make sure of the depth and explained the xray to me in detail. She saved my tooth from a root canal and even did some sealant on other teeth so they dont get spoiled further.She is very patient, kind, and always has time for her patients. There are never any uncomfortable moments with her and she makes sure to answer any questions that you may have. Her clinic is also very clean and puts me at ease whenever I come in for an appointment. I would recommend her to anyone looking for a dentist who really cares about their well-being.

The doctors at Dental Canvas are the most passionate dentists I've come across. I needed my teeth to be straightened in a short amount of time for my marriage. Most clinics suggested me for braces or aligners. Dr. Karishma patiently heard my needs and concerns, and the team tried to formulate a plan to straighten my teeth with veneers and caps. I liked how they laid my options clearly with the risks involved. They took time to discuss with their lab about my treatment, and showed me a trial alignment before starting with my treatment. I liked their step by step approach, compassion and concern. It was like they were personally involved in my well being. I definitely recommend Dr. Karishma and her clinic Dental Canvas to everyone.

I had an excellent experience with Dr. Karishma. She was so professional and friendly, and  explained things pretty clearly to me. I underwent treatment for my TMJ disorder and cavity filling, and they treated me with extra care and helped relieve my pain speedily. Also, they found out the root cause of the pain and recommended to consult Physiotherapist and gave me a splint for my teeth.  This clinic is very neat and hygienic with modern dental equipments. Not only the doctor remaining staffs also so helpful and friendly to guide us. I would  recommend this hospital for any dental condition for a world class experience and customer service.

I came to Dental Canvas for getting my wisdom tooth extraction. Just by listening to my situation, she diagnosed it as an erupting wisdom tooth. I was sent for xray and after minimal wait a surgeon came in to remove my tooth. I was shocked at the promptness of the team. They called the surgeon immediately in front of me. In the meanwhile they explained the procedure to me in detail and answered all my queries calmly. Dr. Karishma goes the extra mile to make you feel comfortable.
Highly recommend her.

Excellent dental consultation with Dr. Karishma. Had my root canal and crown by Dr. Karishma - she was excellent, explained the pros and cons very well and performed the procedure with great attention to detail and very positive outcomes. She showed me the cavity of my tooth on the screen using a camera in my mouth. She even took an xray and explained to me where the infection was. I was highly satisfied with the amount of time she spent in explaining the procedure, the need for it and making sure that I understand .Thank you very much and highly recommended!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very attentive doctor, getting an appointment is also very hassle free. Right from the reception to the dental chair everything went so smooth. The doctor sat down to listen very patiently and addressed all my doubts. I got my teeth whitening done by the doctor. The procedure was very nicely done

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She explains each and every step throughout the procedure which makes you very comfortable. Very high level of hygiene maintained. Does not overcharge at all or recommend extra procedures

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dental implant done by Karishma mam. Very friendly doctor. Painless treatment. Great cleaninliness in the clinic.

I was suffering from severe tooth sensitivity. Dr. Karishma and her team explained me the causes and ways of prevention in great detail. They spent over an hour discussing with me about the possible options and outcomes, provided the minimal available options for treating sensitivity. They performed the sensitivity treatment for me and since then I have been feeling great. My sensitivity is at bay.

Visited Dental Canvas as I had pain in my tooth. I was worried that I will need a root canal done. But Dr. Karishma and her team just did a filling and my pain was eventually gone. I had visited another clinic that told m to do a root canal. But here they did one filling only. All in one appointment and 1/4th the cost
Highly recommend.

I visited Dr. Karishma for my mothers denture. She was very gentle and understanding towards my mother. She explained the whole process in detail and provided different options for treatment. She personally suggested  a regular denture for my mother because of her age. My mother was satisfied with the dentures she received. The fit and look of it is like real teeth. Would definitely recommend Dr. Karishma and her clinic.

Dr Karishma is kind and meticulous, and I always feel like I’m being heard to and that I am walking out with my teeth feeling good and with clear information about what’s happening in my mouth. The root canal she performed for me was painless and the cap she placed exactly matches my natural tooth. Her charges are reasonable, every penny paid is worth it.

I had to have two fillings in the very back of my mouth which is a difficult area for a dentist to work. Not to mention my fear of going to the dentist.  I arrived for my appointment and I was promptly taken to begin my treatment. The doctors at the clinic put me at ease, making me feel comfortable.  Dr. Karishma was very professional and kept me informed about what she was going to do next. *** ******** *** *** ****** *** *** **** ** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have consulted the Dr Karishma for my filling. The procedure was done very well and smoothly.  All my doubts were cleared very well . I definitely recommend the doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I got a consultation here and was advised root canal treatment.  I started my treatment here. Right from consultation to the procedure everything went very smooth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The consultation was detailed and i understood everything well. The procedure was done well and it has been  2 weeks i am extremely comfortable .

For a long time i had put off treatment and ended up with a cavity in my back tooth. I never wanted to go to a dentist coz i didnt want to hear how i dont take care of cleaning my teeth. Last week i got too much pain and ended up going to dr karishma's clinic. 
It was like she knew exactly what to do... didnt lose any time asked me whats wrong. Gave me a painkiller and called the specialist in front of me. She even kept the clinic open when the specialist got late.
Tooth was pulled out quickly she checked again on the xray if it was out fully.
I had maybe a small swelling which went away in a day.
Ive been to other dentists before who just give lectures and tell to come on another day after giving medicines. Dr Karishma has a no-nonsense approach and got the job done.
